amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to direct FERC to withdraw its policy statements titled "Certification of New Interstate Natural Gas Facilities (87 Fed. Reg. 11548) and "Consideration of Greenhouse Gas Emissions in Natural Gas Infrastructure Project Reviews (87 Fed. Reg. 14104).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Roy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
